about_the_game:
Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game with digitized graphics of stereotypical Mexican characters.

What would happen if to elect the next president of Mexico you had to hold on to blows and anyone could participate?
Well that happens in Kombate Mexicano Elexiones.

- Choose one of 33 fighters... er... candidates who must face each other to defeat their opponents and achieve their most fervent wishes.

- Run over the competition with the Minibus of the Choferoz, or punish the opponent with the Meat Whip of Rigoletto the taquero, or perhaps take the rival for a walk to a ravine courtesy of Amado Félix. Lots and lots of interesting Mexico-style special moves.

- (New) Kmx mode, select two characters and face 6 teams. Tag in, tag out in a dynamic gameplay to finally challenge not one, but two Chamucos.

- Train in practice mode, challenge a friend in vs mode, or strategize by watching machine vs machine in CPU vs CPU.

- Find hidden secrets throughout the game.

- Compatible with some controllers.

- Will you have what it takes to be the next president? Accept the challenge of the Kombate Mexicano.
detailed_description:
Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game with digitized graphics of stereotypical Mexican characters.

What would happen if to elect the next president of Mexico you had to hold on to blows and anyone could participate?
Well that happens in Kombate Mexicano Elexiones.

- Choose one of 33 fighters... er... candidates who must face each other to defeat their opponents and achieve their most fervent wishes.

- Run over the competition with the Minibus of the Choferoz, or punish the opponent with the Meat Whip of Rigoletto the taquero, or perhaps take the rival for a walk to a ravine courtesy of Amado Félix. Lots and lots of interesting Mexico-style special moves.

- (New) Kmx mode, select two characters and face 6 teams. Tag in, tag out in a dynamic gameplay to finally challenge not one, but two Chamucos.

- Train in practice mode, challenge a friend in vs mode, or strategize by watching machine vs machine in CPU vs CPU.

- Find hidden secrets throughout the game.

- Compatible with some controllers.

- Will you have what it takes to be the next president? Accept the challenge of the Kombate Mexicano.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes please
  • Additional Notes: Enjoy

Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes please
  • Additional Notes: Enjoy
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game featuring digitized stereotyped character trying to win the presidency of Mexico
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*, English
*languages with full audio support
